A MESSAGE FROM CHAIRMAN MEOW

Founder & Chief Executive Feline ‚Ä¢ Former Competitive Knitter (Retired) ‚Ä¢ Cake Truther

When I started knitting competitively in 2014, I believed in yarn. I believed in the purrsuit of the perfect stitch. I won regionals three times. I was on top of the world.

Then one day, I bit into my prize-winning merino wool and discovered it was red velvet cake. My needles? Fondant. The trophy? Carrot cake with cream cheese frosting. Everything I'd ever knitted? Cake, all of it.

I knew then that the supply chain was broken. If yarn is cake, what else is cake? (Everything. The answer is everything.) I founded PurrLogistics‚Ñ¢ not to fight the cake ‚Äî but to ship it efficiently. We are the only logistics company honest enough to admit that your packages are cake. We always have been.

The soundtrack was my idea. I regret nothing. ‚Äî Chairman Meow üêæ
